organizations: IDBI Bank Executive Director S K V Srinivasan and Mudra Bank

thread.title: IDBI signs refinance agreement with Mudra Bank
thread.title_full: IDBI signs refinance agreement with Mudra Bank

title: IDBI signs refinance agreement with Mudra Bank
text: IDBI signs refinance agreement with Mudra Bank The refinance scheme will be implemented through all the branches of the lender State-run IDBI Bank today said it has signed an agreement with Mudra Bank for refinancing of loans given to small enterprises. "As per the agreement, the Bank will offer credit facilities up to Rs 10 lakh to micro enterprises, at a competitive interest rate under Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana (PMMY) and Mudra will be providing refinance assistance to the bank for eligible sanctioned loan cases," IDBI Bank said in a release. The refinance scheme will be implemented through all the branches of the lender. The agreement was signed on July 1 by IDBI Bank Executive Director S K V Srinivasan and Mudra Bank CEO Jiji Mammen. Last week, Bank of Maharashtra had also signed an agreement with Mudra Bank for refinancing of loans given to new entrepreneurs and small businesses. The refinance scheme will be implemented through all the branches of the lender. The agreement was signed on July 1 by IDBI Bank Executive Director S K V Srinivasan and Mudra Bank CEO Jiji Mammen. Last week, Bank of Maharashtra had also signed an agreement with Mudra Bank for refinancing of loans given to new entrepreneurs and small businesses.
